brief: Inspects the underlying soundwave of an audio signal.

methods.name: analyze()
methods.desc: Gets the content of the current audiobuffer from the input source.

methods.name: input()
methods.desc: Define the audio input for the analyzer.

description:
This is a Waveform analyzer. It returns the waveform of an audio stream the moment it is queried with the analyze() method.
Note that by default all sound generators (including microphone capture from AudioIn) have an amplitude of 1, which means that the values of their waveform will be numbers in the range [-0.5, 0.5].
name: Waveform

parameters.name: nsamples
parameters.description: number of waveform samples that you want to be able to read at once (a positive integer).
